name: Yuka's Roots
description:
Under the deepest roots of the wood there is a story, from the times when plants and animals lived together. Our ancient Napi was destinated to be a great chaman, get into the wood and connect with his roots; but evilness of forest had other plans for him, this ancient being burn everything down its feet, withou a reason or motivation, just evil.

It didn't take long for Napi to realized that, far in the woods he could watched the Forest burn to ashes. Worried about forest creatures he start a crusaid to heal and save the forest.

'Yuka's Roots' is a puzzle and platformer type game developed with Unity Engine and programmed in C#. The design takes both 2D and 3D design for models, characters. enviroments, Ul, etc.
